title: Console pane is out of position with tab panel
author: s-ccy
body_snippet:
When I open a fresh new connection(SSH/PUTTY), I am supposed to see the console opened as a new tab. This has behaved well for months, but one day I started seeing console window being out of position/offset to somewhere lower than it should be inside the tab pane. Bottom part of the console window is hidden as the bottom half of the console window is below the visible area of the tab panel. I cannot scroll further to make the bottom part of console visible.

I have also tried installing the nightly build 1.77.2-nb version and it seems behaving the same.

comments.snippet: I found that, if I maximize and restore down the window every time before I open a new connection, the console window has a slightly higher chance of showing in the correct position.

comments.author: michaelrstewart1
comments.snippet: I have this issue as well, and it makes the application unusable for SSH sessions. I've tried fiddling with the default PuTTY settings, reinstalling, resetting layout, etc., and nothing seems to correct it.
